title: Save Vanra
content:
hese minions. On the other side, you can lower the wall to let your whole team pass. Go down the cellar, burn the mushrooms and fight Ethel, but make sure to throw the Hag's Bane on her so that she vomits up Vanra. Alternatively, you can use non-lethal attack to knock out Ethel then save Vanra. Turn in the quest for your reward

How to unlock Save Vanra

Meet Lora at Basilisk Gate

Save Vanra Rewards

Duelist's Prerogative Amulet of Windrider
